text: Volodymyr Petrovich Pak (; 17 June 1934 – 6 January 2022) was a Ukrainian politician. He was a member of the People's Union "Our Ukraine. He was in the Verkhovna Rada from 2005 to 2006. Pak was born in Stanisławów Voivodeship, Second Polish Republic. Pak died in Kyiv, Ukraine on 6 January 2022, at the age of 87. ==References== Category:1934 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Members of the Verkhovna Rada
title: Volodymyr Pak
